root {
  en {
    simple { "This is a simple message." }
    plural { "This is a {0, plural
              one { single result }
              other { collection of results }}" }
    multistuff {
     { "this is a string" },
     { "yet another string" },
     { table {
         foo { "haha" }
     }}
   }   
  }
  fr {
    notre { "this is a simple message." }
  }
}
